Table 2: Calculating NPV. With the TI Business Analyst II Plus
Key Strokes
Explanation
Display
[CF] [2nd] [(CLR WORK]
Clear memory registers
CFO = 0.00000
2,000 (+/-) [ENTER)
Initial cash outlay
CFO = -2,000.00000
[1] 1,000 [ENTER]
Period 1 cash flow
C01 = 1,000.00000
[1]
Frequency of cash flow 1
FO1 = 1.00000
[] 800 [ENTER]
Period 2 cash flow
C02 = 800.00000
Frequency of cash flow 2
F02 = 1.00000
[I] 600 [ENTER]
Period 3 cash flow
C03 = 600.00000
Frequency of cash flow 3
FO3 = 1.00000
[I] 200 [ENTER]
Period 4 cash flow
C04 = 200.00000
Frequency of cash flow 4
F04 = 1.00000
[NPV] 10 [ENTER]
10% discount rate
I = 10.00000
[I] (CPT)
Calculate NPV
NPV = 157.63951
